translations: v.更新；向……提供最新信息（update 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He was back in the office, updating the work schedule on the computer.
sentences.translation: 他回到办公室，在计算机上更新了工作日程。

sentences.sentence: The company has spent thousands of pounds updating their computer systems.
sentences.translation: 公司花了几千英镑更新计算机系统。

sentences.sentence: Of course you have to keep updating your knowledge of the streets, because the city changes.
sentences.translation: 当然，你必须不断更新你对街道的了解，因为城市在变化。
